messages.subject: GAK/PLAYDOUGH RECIPES
messages.msgSnippet: i ve seen some really cool gak/playdough/silly putty recipes on the net at times and used to have a lil 20 page booklet of every gak recipe in existence at one
messages.messageBody:
i've seen some really cool gak/playdough/silly putty recipes on the
net at times and used to have a lil 20 page booklet of every gak
recipe in existence at one time (including a weird one made of coffee
grounds and ibex entrails or soemthing bizarre like that). does anyone
have some links to gak/playdough recipes?

tnx
dj
